trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn is the very picture of determination.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_01<tab>Varshahn stands ready to sally forth into the moon's dark depths, there to confront Zeromus and rescue his sister Azdaja. Though the stakes are high, he vows to keep his emotions in check and let nothing sway him from his chosen course─and by the set of his jaw, you do not doubt that he will be true to his word.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_02<tab>As you advance through the red moon's subterranean maze, you happen upon a memoria crystal. No sooner does it begin to glow than you find yourself reliving a memory of bygone days, in which a man named Durante fights to protect king and country alongside his companion Golbez. The pair are in pursuit of a dark memoriate, whom they finally confront in the heart of a castle. The malign warrior appears defeated, but with his final breath corrupts Golbez with the power of a dark memoria crystal, leaving Durante with no choice but to lay his friend low and seal him in memoria. Though heartbroken, he is not deterred from his mission, and proclaims that Golbez will live on as the hero who saves the world.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_03<tab>The memory has laid bare the shocking truth: the man you believed to be Golbez is in fact his companion Durante. The impostor emerges from the shadows to stand before you, and Zero urges him to abandon his desperate cause, but the man who was Durante remains adamant that terrible might wielded for tremendous change is the only answer. He reveals that, in his bid to end the Contramemoria, it was none other than he who unleashed the Flood of Darkness and doomed the Thirteenth. Having reaffirmed his purpose and his name, Golbez then takes his leave to ensure that nothing interferes with Zeromus's awakening.
※In the event that you leave the darkened vestibule, you may return via the red moon.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_04<tab>In spite of everything you have heard from Golbez, Zero clings to the hope that he may yet see reason. Together you venture deeper into the moon's subterrane in search of the man, determined to put an end to his dark plot once and for all.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_05<tab>At last you corner Golbez in his domain─only to discover it is a ploy. Your foe conjures shades of his fallen archfiends, together with whom he attempts to bar the path to Zeromus, but your comrades manage to occupy them long enough to afford you an opening to slip past. So it is that you arrive in the nexus where the dread voidsent slumbers. It stirs to life in your presence, and it falls to you to prevent it from destroying the barrier between worlds.
※The Abyssal Fracture can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_06<tab>A harrowing battle ensues in which the very fabric of reality begins to fray. Yet for all its strength, Zeromus falters. You deliver the decisive strike, causing Golbez's champion to dissipate. Alas, the air remains thick with despair...

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_07<tab>As was feared, Zeromus coalesces from the aether as many times as it is struck down. But joined by your comrades─a repentant Golbez among them─you succeed not only in sealing the being in memoria, but rescuing Azdaja besides. Thus is the day won, and after millennia, Vrtra reunited with his beloved sister.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_08<tab>Though your meeting with Zero was mere happenstance, from it grew a friendship that gave the memoriate a new beginning. Together with Golbez, she is confident that the void can be restored. And should they want for aid, they now know where to find it.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_00<tab>Enter the Lunar Subterrane.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_01<tab>Clear the Lunar Subterrane.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Zero.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Zero.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Glad though I am that the plan worked, we are in no position to celebrate. The day is not won yet!
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>She's no longer the cold, distant soul we met in the void. Or perhaps, until now, she just never had a chance to be who she truly is.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_010<tab>This radiance is just the beginning. We must see it cast into the deepest depths of the moon.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_015<tab>My dragon form shall remain here to secure our escape route. The voidsent who dare to approach the gate will reckon with me.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Travel to the red moon?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_020<tab>Rest assured I will not let my emotions overwhelm me. When the moment comes, I will call to my sister, and I will wrest her free from Zeromus.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_021<tab>The crater awaits. Woe betide any who bar our path.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Lunar Subterrane.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>The lingering Light illuminates the way to our foe. It will not escape us.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_035<tab>We've no time to waste. The voidsent we felled will return ere long.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_040<tab>“Take heart, and protect them well”... I will live up to my own words. This I swear.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_045<tab>When we find Golbez, let me speak with him─please. There is something I must know.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>To yearn to save the world, only to bring about its unmaking... 'Tis a tragic tale. But it changes nothing.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_305<tab>We rarely believe ourselves the villain. But if our ends demand unconscionable sacrifice, what else can we be?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_310<tab>He speaks of salvation─of fulfilling an honored friend's legacy. Yet he does not scruple to discard others for his ambitions...
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_400<tab>Let us press on.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_405<tab>In the darkest recesses of the moon await Golbez and Zeromus. They are resolved to save their world...and condemn yours.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_406<tab>Are you prepared to brave the dark?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Travel to the darkened vestibule?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Travel to the Abyssal Fracture?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_600<tab>That Azdaja lives is a miracle made possible by the unique nature of the void...
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_601<tab>...Ah, yes. The aether transmitters, I shall leave with Zero. They will be of more use in the Thirteenth than in the Source.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_605<tab>I've already seen Varshahn safely to Vrtra. Many would be heartbroken if their “little brother” failed to return home.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_610<tab>Never again shall we be parted, Sister. Never again.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_700<tab>Never did I imagine that the Light I bore could bring about such change.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_701<tab>As our domains are shaped by our innermost desires, perhaps this is a reflection of the hope that had quickened in my heart.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_702<tab>You came to the Thirteenth to rescue Azdaja and protect your world. Our meeting was happenstance, and our association one of mutual convenience.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_703<tab>Yet you and yours always treated me with kindness. As a friend. And through your friendship, I've found a new beginning.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_704<tab>I'm forever in your debt.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_705<tab>You may now enter the Lunar Subterrane with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
